ygData.subject: Re: Archery--Skill Cap???
ygData.msgSnippet: I seem to hit this cap at level 19, and it still wont increase at level 20..... maybe archary is bugged on us paladins.... time to ask a GM i think... Regards
ygData.messageBody:
I seem to hit this cap at level 19, and it still wont increase at level
20..... maybe archary is bugged on us paladins.... time to ask a GM i
think...


Regards
Cubious
Paladin of the 20th Circle

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rodney Miller [SMTP:RMiller@...]
> Sent: 22 June 1999 17:00
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Archery--Skill Cap???
>
> From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>
>
> Last night I hit level 24 and was able to stop in Qeynos and go to see the
> one Paladin trainer out there. I had been shooting blue items with my Bow
> all day long and had not been able to raise the skill. So I had decided
> to
> put more practices into it even though it is expensive. And the trainer
> said I had reached my skill limit or some such wording and could not offer
> me any further training in that skill. My skill level is only Good, which
> is about what? 75 or so? Is this my limit for all time? Or does this go
> up
> in the future? This is frustrating, cause I still miss quite a bit. Any
> feedback would be appreciated.
>
> Grod
> Newly 24th Level Paladin
> Innoruuk
>
